thing-type.label: Switch
thing-type.description: Published PLC's switch structure, see binding description

parameter.name: state
parameter.label: State variable
parameter.description: Variable name that holds switch state (0 or 1)

parameter.name: on
parameter.label: Switch on variable
parameter.description: Bool variable that trigger switch on action on rising edge (0 -> 1)

parameter.name: off
parameter.label: Switch off variable
parameter.description: Bool variable that trigger switch off action on rising edge (0 -> 1)

parameter.name: refreshGroup
parameter.label: Refresh group
parameter.description: Refresh group define how frequently values will updated, default is REALTIME
